title: Ginger-Spiced Butternut and Carrot Soup
ingredients: ['1/2 medium butternut squash', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '450g carrots, peeled and diced', '3 cloves garlic, crushed or to taste', '1 (5cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 litre water', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '4 tablespoons double cream']
